item.title: The Girl-of-the-Month Club, Part 5

Each month you would receive a different girl, dressed to provide the fantasy. This is the story of one year in the life of Blake Winthope and how he enjoyed his subscription. item.title: Decisions In The Pedo Ring
item.description: This gives an overview and description of the characters in the Pedophile Ring cycle of stories, and a brief summary of the overall story so far. When it continues after the September recess, there are a number of directions it can go. For a bit of fun and reader involvement, I've described 5 possible scenarios A-E which I invite readers to choose from. I think this adds realism, and the element of the unpredictable. I'll go with the 'popular vote', just as if the memers of the pedo ring have arirved at a consensus. Vote now! Put a few words in review here, or email if you have more detailed ideas.

Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, used that time for a quick abduction and rape of 'fresh' 10yo Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). Today, all 4 men are round at Sean's for 'an evening of Hannah'.

item.title: Abducting Nice 10yo Abigail
item.description: This is part 17 in the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah is taking a break from the story for a while, as she has been taken on holiday by her schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Here Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, carry out their abduction of Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). Can be read from here, but makes more sense if you have followed the previous stories.

item.title: Planning For Sweet Innocent Abigail
item.description: This is part 16 of the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah is taking a break from the story for a while, as she has been taken on holiday by her schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Here Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, discuss the abduction of the innocent 10yo Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). Complicated? A bit, but makes more sense if you have followed the previous stories.

item.title: The Rape Of Abigail
item.description: This is part 18 in the Pedophile Ring series. 9yo Hannah is taking a break from the story for a while, as she has been taken on holiday by her schoolteacher/abuser, Dan. Here Sean and his hard-edged pedo buddy, Simon, are carrying out their planned abduction and rape of Abigail, stepgranddaughter of Bill (the 3rd of Hannah's abusers). They have her in a clearing, in the woods, having already forced her to strip and subjected her to fondling and kissing and cowed her by threats, which was not difficult.

item.title: Hannah, Your Third Man Is Here
item.description: '...and he wants you, very much, because you're a child, you're a girl, and you're pretty, and he is a pedophile'. This is the 12th part of the Pedophile Ring series. Characters: Hannah (9yo); her stepfather Sean (35yo); her teacher Dan (32yo), and now...

item.title: Little Hannah's Summer Of Molestation
item.description: This is part 13 of the Paedophile Ring series. Hannah is a 9yo girl, brunette, pale and pretty, who has been systematically sexually molested for 18 months by her mother's live-in boyfriend, 35yo Sean. Recently he has brought in Dan, her 32yo schoolteacher and an old friend of his, 65yo Bill, to enjoy the fun. Sean is quite harsh, Dan is more loving, and Bill seems ok so far.

item.title: Maybe A Worse Pedo For Little Hannah
item.description: This is part 15 of the Paedophile Ring series. 35yo Sean has profoundly sexually molested the pretty brunette 9yo daughter of his GF, Michelle, for 18 months. Recently he has brought in Dan, her 32yo schoolteacher and an old friend of his, 65yo Bill, to enjoy the fun.

item.title: 9-Year-Old Hannah Worries About Meeting Man
item.description: This is part 11 in the Pedophile Ring series but can be enjoyed sepsrately. Sean is a 35yo guy who lives with a single Mum, but only because she has a pretty daughter, Hannah. Her 32yo schoolteacher, Daniel Hall, became complicit in the fun recently. Then Dan persuaded Sean to invite an old friend into the fold.

item.title: A Third Man For Little Hannah
item.description: This is the 10th part of the Paedophile Ring series. Sean is a 35yo guy who lives with a single Mum, but only - aghem - because she has a pretty 9yo daughter. Hannah's 32yo school teacher, Daniel Hall, has got involved recently too.

item.title: Dan Returns For More Of Little Hannah
item.description: This is the 8th part of the Paedophile Ring series. Sean is a 35yo guy who lives with a single Mum, for the purpose of sexually abusing her pretty 9yo daughter. A few days ago he invited Hannah's school teacher, 32yo Dan, to join in the fun. Now Dan comes for his second visit.

item.title: Dan's Idea For Little Hannah
item.description: This is the 9th part of the Paedophile Ring series. Sean is a 35yo guy who lives with a single Mum, for the purpose of sexually abusing her pretty 9yo daughter. Hannah's 32yo school teacher, Daniel Hall, has become complicit in the fun. This is his 2nd visit to see Hannah, and he clearly has 'plans'.

item.title: Putting 9-Year-Old Hannah To Bed
item.description: This is the 7th story in the Pedophile Ring series, but can be read separate. Sean is a 35yo guy who lives with a single Mum, for the purpose of sexually abusing her pretty 9yo daughter. He has just 'branched out' by inviting Hannah's schoolteacher, 32yo Dan, to join in the fun. It now comes to the end of Dan's first visit, and he had a 'nice idea' to cap it off.

item.title: Nothing Until Her Death
item.description: Father's needs are met after the untimely passing of his wife.

item.title: Sharing 9-Year-Old Hannah
item.description: This is the story 6 in the Pedophile Ring series. Here, Hannah's schoolteacher has taken up the invite to visit her and her stepdad abuser, and fulfill his own deeply illicit dreams with a child. Hannah is a pretty child, and one of his favourites in the class, so it is truly a dream come true for him.

item.title: A Primary Teacher's Pedo Dream
item.description: This is part 5 in the Pedophile Ring series. Sean is a 35yo guy and the live-in boyfriend of a pretty 9yo girl's mother. He has one purpose in life for this arrangement, and now he has met 'Dan' -Hannah's schoolteacher - and it seems Dan also likes little girls in THAT way.

item.title: Life To the Max, Part 2
item.description: The Ongoing Saga of Max Adams his Life loves and other matters

item.title: Pedo Sean And Little Hannah's Secret Life
item.description: This is part 4 in the Pedophile Ring series. Each story can be enjoyed as a stand-alone, but benefits from the series. Sean is a 35yo man, the live-in boyfriend of 9-year-old pretty brunette Hannah's mother. She is a weak, 'look-the-other-way' character who has little involvment in the story.

item.title: Pedo Sean's 10 Favourite Things
item.description: This is number 1 in a series of stories about a pedo ring from its beginning to its indefinate expansion. In this one, we meet Sean (a 35yo pedo) and Hannah (his 9yo girl).

item.title: Pedo Sean's 11th Favourite Thing
item.description: Story number 2 featuring the adventures of Sean (a 35yo pedo) and Hannah (a 9yo girl). The 1st was called 'Pedo Sean's 10 Favourite Things'.

item.title: Pedo Sean's Tender and Loving Side
item.description: Story number 3 featuring these characters (the central 2 characters in a pedo ring), and can be read without having read the others, but they may enhance it for you.

item.title: Uncle Dan
item.description: A girl who has learned through experience about sex from her father goes to live with her Uncle and proceeds to seduce him.

item.title: Life To the Max, Part 1
item.description: The ongoing sagas of Max Adams and his Family, Friends and Enemies. His Life Loves and other deeds both good and bad.

item.title: My Daughter Emily is Introduced
item.description: Dad loses in a divorce, where his young daughter would become estranged. However, years later - Dad is re-united and granted custody.

item.title: It Doesn't Matter
item.description: Chapter 1 My name is Roy and I was 15 years old at the time of this story. This is the story of a wonderful afternoon I enjoyed last year with my cousin Shelley and some of her friends. Shelley was then 10, and we have grown up together almost as brother and sister. In fact, we have been closer than most brothers and sisters in many ways, not least because our families are nudists.

item.title: Black Family Love
item.description: Ebony describes her initiation into 'family love' beginning at age two.

item.title: Daddy & Daughter, Dinner & Dance, Part 2
item.description: The pedosexual adventure continues with daughter and friends.

item.title: Daddy & Daughter, Dinner & Dance, Part 1
item.description: Dad takes daughter to annual event. Meets another pedo at movie before dance and things get sexier from there.

item.title: Darla's Big Break, Part 1B
item.description: Having convinced her 15 year old brother to be her tutor, 8 year old Darla turns out to be a quick study, but their activities get more than their bodies going, and soon, almost without noticing, they are in the middle of a torrid love affair.

item.title: Darla's Big Break, Part 1A
item.description: When little eight year old Darla meets a grown man called Jerry at the theater she doesn't know he's just struck out on his own to produce child porn independently, or that he's looking for a girl just like her to be his star. And although he suspects it on first sight, Jerry can't yet know exactly how perfect She is or how much her brother has done to prepare her.

item.title: The Incident At Cherry Lake, Part 5
item.description: After a tense confrontation with Jackie, Derick decides to do what he thought he'd been trying to avoid. Fuck her youngest daughter, little 12 year old Jessica, and this causes Jackie to relive some childhood memories.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 6
item.description: In this, the final chapter, Ashley's father receives some disturbing news, and fearing his time with her might be growing short he decides that it's time to deflower his baby girl, and have full on sexual intercourse.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 4
item.description: After some hot sex play with his daughter our narrator is finally overcome by guilt, suffering an emotional break down, and we learn about his 'family tradition'.

item.title: The Incident At Cherry Lake, Part 2
item.description: “Who are you Mister?” the young girl asked as she slowly approached Derick in the semi-dark bed room. Derick had broken in to rob the place, but had forgotten to lock the door, and been caught in the act by this girl. He was so surprised by her presence that he couldn’t move, or say anything, but then as she got closer, she surprised him even more. She lifted her little dress, holding it up with her chin, and then reached down, pulling her panties to her knees, revealing her fat, hairless outer labia with her tight little slit.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 1
item.description: Much to his horror, a man finds himself sexually molesting his young daughter.

item.title: Loving Teacher, Part 1
item.description: Samantha Hargraves loved being a teacher, it was all she had dreamed of being since she was a little girl. She was an excellent teacher, mostly due to the great love she had for her students. She had studied hard throughout her years in public school and then gone on to study at university, and all that time she had harbored a dark, twisted, little secret. Samantha Hargraves loved little girls.
